channel.title: Documentation on Tinkle
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Tinkle

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: System requirements macOS 11 Big Sur or later Installation Download dmg file from here. Open a downloaded dmg file. Move Tinkle.app into Applications. Open Tinkle from Launchpad. Accessibility Access dialog will be shown. Click the Open System Settings button. (Tinkle uses the accessibility features in order to detect the focused window changes.) Enable Tinkle on System Settings > Privacy & Security > Accessibility. Finished! A visual effect is shown when you change the focused window while Tinkle is running.

item.title: Pricing
item.description: Tinkle is an open source software and you can use it without any purchases.

item.title: Release notes
item.description: Tinkle 2.4.0 📦 Download 📅 Release date Nov 12, 2023 ⚡️ Improvements Neon effects have been improved for better visibility. Added Line into the effect choices. Sparkle Framework has been updated. Tinkle 2.3.0 📦 Download 📅 Release date Jul 16, 2023 ⚡️ Improvements Changed the default effect to Neon (gray). Became sandboxed app. Sparkle Framework has been updated. Tinkle 2.1.0 📦 Download 📅 Release date May 7, 2022 ⚡️ Improvements Sparkle Framework has been updated.
